indications.text: fluorescein sodium benoxinate hydrochloride ophthalmic solution , 0.3 % /0.4 % indicated ophthalmic procedures adult pediatric patients requiring disclosing agent combination topical ophthalmic anesthetic agent .

warningsAndPrecautions: fluorescein sodium benoxinate hydrochloride ophthalmic solution , 0.3 % /0.4 % supplied sterile , aqueous , topical ophthalmic solution fill volume 5 ml 6 ml amber glass bottle black polypropylene cap sterilized rubber dropper bulb glass pipette . ndc 24208-734-05 storage : store refrigerator 2°c 8°c ( 36°f 46°f ) . protect light . opening , stored one month stored room temperature expiration date bottle stored refrigerated conditions . keep tightly closed .

name: Fluorescein Sodium and Benoxinate Hydrochloride
indications_original: Fluorescein Sodium and Benoxinate Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution, 0.3%/0.4% is indicated for ophthalmic procedures in adult and pediatric patients requiring a disclosing agent in combination with a topical ophthalmic anesthetic agent.
contraindications_original: Instill 1 to 2 drops topically in the eye as needed.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Fluorescein Sodium and Benoxinate Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution, 0.3%/0.4% is supplied as a sterile, aqueous, topical ophthalmic solution with a fill volume of 5 mL in a 6 mL amber glass bottle and a black polypropylene cap with a sterilized rubber dropper bulb and glass pipette.
                  NDC 24208-734-05
                  
                     Storage:Store in a refrigerator at 2°C to 8°C (36°F to 46°F). Protect from light. After opening, can be stored up to one month if stored at room temperature or until the expiration date on the bottle if stored in refrigerated conditions. Keep tightly closed.
adverseReactions_original: Fluorescein Sodium and Benoxinate Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution, 0.3%/0.4% is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to any component of this product.
